I have come here often over the years, but in the last few months I've become a regular customer. Amongst all the neighboring businesses, this location has always been the cleanest and friendliest. The front staff have always been polite and happy to help; I've regularly been greeted by Elijah, Tatiana, Jasmine, and Zabella. I don't know the chefs by name, but the food has always been excellently prepared and served.
Amazing customer service from Zabella
Bella is the best
I walked into smash burger at 9 pm and Elijah was so very friendly and attentive made sure my food was perfect please give this person a raise he is a very person in the west 238th st location
Thanks for the great customer service, Elijah!!

Food is absolutely disgusting. I asked for tomatoes in my burger. They gave me two small cherry tomato slices that didn‚Äôt fit the whole burger.
I paid $22 for this meal they didn‚Äôt put enough cheese they put some nasty P colored butter on top of my bun instead if I asked for American cheese I should get it on the entire bun.
Also I should‚Äôve gotten a slice of American cheese next time I‚Äôm never buying from here again.
I tried this earlier and it was better when I ordered from the website, but this is deplorable and really disgusting and  the burger looks just plain diseased and horribly nasty.
The pickles look nasty.
The lettuce isn‚Äôt even on burger enough and it took almost 40 minutes to get here.
I‚Äôm disgusted you guys don‚Äôt deserve my money and you guys need help.
I hope you have a horrible rest of your year and life good day!
I couldn‚Äôt call any of you saints.

The management team, particularly Joshua and Jessica, deserve special mention. They are known for their exceptional leadership skills, friendly demeanor, and dedication to ensuring every customer has a great experience. Their ability to motivate staff and maintain high standards makes Smashburger a standout choice for burger lovers.

Just had a great experience at Smashburger! The food was on point ‚Äî fresh, juicy, and came out quick. But big shoutout to the cashier ‚Äî super friendly, patient, and really made the ordering process smooth. Great energy and customer service. Definitely coming back! üëèüçîüî•

I have been coming to this Smashburger location with my family for years, but after my most recent experience, I will not be returning.

I ordered five crispy chicken sandwiches along with smash fries and a drink. When I got home and took a bite, the chicken tasted slimy. Upon checking, I saw the meat was pink and clearly undercooked. I inspected the rest of the sandwiches and found that one more was also raw, while the others appeared to be cooked.

I immediately called the store and spoke with a manager, who asked me to bring the food back. When I returned, I requested a refund but was told I could not get my money back. The manager offered no explanation or apology, just a suggestion to remake the sandwiches, which I declined. When I mentioned I would be contacting the Department of Health, the manager responded with a slick comment and even provided the phone number.

It was also concerning to see very young employees in the kitchen who seemed improperly trained, likely a factor in this serious food safety issue. I did contact the health department, but all they did was ask for details and said they would follow up with the location.

This location used to be great, but now it has completely fallen off. Serving raw chicken is unacceptable and dangerous. Stay away.

From the moment I walked in, Tatyanna greeted me with a friendly smile and a welcoming attitude. She was patient, helpful with the menu, and made the ordering process quick and easy. You could tell she genuinely cared about providing great customer service.

Jessica and Joshua, the shift leaders on duty, were also outstanding. They kept the restaurant running smoothly even during a busy time. I noticed them supporting their team, checking in with customers, and maintaining a clean, organized environment. They really led by example and contributed to a positive and professional atmosphere. Overall, it‚Äôs not just the food that will bring me back‚Äîit's the excellent service and positive energy from employees like Tatyanna and mangers like Jessica and Joshua. Great job To there General Manager fr putting them on there amazing team
Elijah was so kind and made me feel very welcome. He even asked me how to spell my name correctly which nobody does. The smash Tots he recommended were SO GOOD.

This place used to be so good when it opened. Now the food just tastes like an over priced Wendy‚Äôs. The waffle fries were burn, the burger was salty and none of the ingredients were fresh the chicken tenders overcooked even the fries taste so much different than what they used. I‚Äôm so mad that I wasted $40 on terrible tasting two meals. Also had to wait over 10 minutes after my order said it was ready for pick up.

Cashier Elijah was great! He provided us with quick service and was very hospitable.
Excellent place to dine-in!

Not only was the food mad good (especially compared to the other options in the area, service was god-tier! Elijah came in clutch with prime recommendations as well as super friendly. 10/10 recommend!
Elijah was such an amazing server! He treated me with kindness I never seen in my life! highly recommend this place!

I‚Äôve been coming to this particular restaurant for about 4 years. As you could imagine the employees changed often and the quality of the was subpar to say the least. TODAY I returned after about a 7 month hiatus. THIS WAS THE BEST SMASHBURGER I HAD SINCE I STARTED COMING! Ashley Was working and did such a great job! If she keeps running it like this business will boom again!!

It's still nice, and the food is still awesome.
Got great customer service. The place is clean as well.

Just had the best smash burger experience ever! Tatyanna was absolutely amazing‚Äîsuper friendly, fast, and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. Her energy really made the visit special. Huge shoutout to Zabella, the manager, too‚Äîclearly running a tight ship with a great team. The food was incredible, the service even better. Definitely coming back!
Elijah Provided such amazing customer service !  He treated me and my friends with such care. I feel like a valued customer, will come here again.
Cashier was super informative. Really nice and I initially came in for a drink but gladly I‚Äôm leaving with a full meal. First and not my last time!

Fun fast casual burger joint with good options. Staff was friendly and efficient. Like the Brussel sprouts side option - they're frying them in oil but a little healthier than the fries... Good patty choices - would like to see buffalo‚Ä¶
Elijah was great, beautiful customer service especially that I didnt know what I wanted he was super helpful. I'll definitely come back soon!

I'm am totally hooked on smash burger. I have ordered online before and it was great the delivery was awesome because it came in one piece lol. But the day that I actually went to the restaurant even during the quarantine they were great‚Ä¶
Burgers have been bomb! Thank you Elijah for your hospitality. I love the sweet potato waffle fries and will be back.

My grandson loves this place friendly people friendly places food 10/10 people 100/10 and overall amazing they have this wall by the drinks with all these coloring pages from many kids that eat free every wedensday all year round defiently recommend coming back for a good time and amazing food
Tatyanna customer service was amazing from the jump ! Time I walked in, she made sure to assist me with my order and being that I‚Äôm new here she gave me a few suggestions that I won‚Äôt forget!

this store is amazing on a sunday nice and slow you can really enjoy the food and atmosphere there managing team isamazing went in wanting one burger ened up with a whole meal and a memory this place is wonderful there shift leads are amazing esspicaycally the girl and even though there assiant manager wasnt much help the shiftleader i believe is jessica she still stood tall and was amazing 10/10 from her give a raise forsure
Elijah from this location was absolutely amazing very helpful and patient while we order it was my first time visiting and I will be sure to come back.

My first time going to a Smashburger location and I was truly impressed. The place is conveniently located right off the 1 train at the 238 stop and is right across the BJ's. This way I can load up on some carbs to fuel my shopping at BJ'S which is exactly what I did during this visit. When I walked in the place was virtually empty with way more staff than customers....three customers in total. The place is so beautiful I was not able to comprehend why it was empty. The girl at the register was helpful and has a great sense of humor. I ended up getting the BBQ Bacon Cheddar Black Bean Burger with sweet potatoes fries and chipotle sauce. My stomach cannot handle regular milk or spicy food so I had to ask if it was just a hint for flavor or habanero level spicy. The entire place was very clean, great place for someone with OCD, everything was neatly and nicely organized. They have table service my food was brought out on a nice metal tray/rack. Everything tasted great. As I was about to leave...5pm WHOA! It's like a whole swarm of customers with children descended on this location...the line was to the exit door the entire time after 5pm then I realized kids get a free meal after 5pm with purchase of an adult meal! SCORE....for parents...and their beneficiaries! I highly recommend, especially if you have a kid, or two, or three. I will definitely grab a bite here every weekend I go to BJ'S.
Elijah was truly amazing. I had to use to use the bathroom before I ordered and he understood. I really appreciated that. Thank you. I will be back.

This review is for the food truck.

I purchased the burger, chicken sandwich and fries for about $32.

Both sandwiches were very disappointing.

The burger was tasteless. I could have gotten something more tasty and cheaper at a deli. I‚Äôm also not entirely certain the cheese was cheddar. Seemed more like American.

The chicken sandwich was worse. I had hoped it would be a nice fried chicken breast but it was basically thin, overcooked chicken strips. The best part was the pickles.

The fries were ok, but bland and overpriced for what you get.

Update: now that I have looked a photos of other people's smashburger, what I purchased doesn't even look the same. My bun was a sesame seed bun (not potato),  the fries were not the same and even the wrapping was different. So I'm not sure if I got conned by some knock-off smashburger truck or something.

Would I try smashburger again: no.
My trip here was amazing .. clean and great service , the employee Elijah was a big help with completing my order.. will return soon.

The customer service was good. The restaurant looked clean. The smashfries were ok and so was the burger. I had the double patty smac and cheese burger, it was good; a little salty(but that's the burger not the Mac and cheese). I would probably try the smac and cheese burger again, but I would most likely try the tater tots instead next time.
Josh was very nice and patient with me during my visit the food is as always a 10/10 would highly recommend
Food Is Always delivered fast and delicious. Im a regular customer and love the environment! 10/10 definitely recommend.
My first visit here was fantastic! The atmosphere was warm and inviting, and I was greeted by the manager Ashley, making it an excellent choice for dining with kids, Thank you again Ashley.
I was having a real bad day and thanks to Tatyanna with her amazing customer service, she brightened up my whole day! She was beyond helpful and the food was good !
I've been eating here for years. It's always clean, the food is delicious, and the service is great!
Very nice and clean location.  All the toppings and bun was AMAZING. Loved the egg and bacon. I only wish they had a more flavourful patty.  The beef lack flavor but overall topping was great!

Love Smashburger! This location is clean and the food is always excellent.
Chris is a great cashier-very patient and attentive!
Elijah was very nice and helpful. This is a great place to grab a bite to eat. Thank you, Elijah!

I come here twice a month and every time I come Tatyanna is so wonderful to me so nice and she even knows my order by heart,
now that is amazing costumer service and the food always delicious!! :)
